message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SD, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.SI 

The paper discusses a security mechanism for copresence verification, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The technique proposed in the paper leverages acoustic Room Impulse Response (RIR), which involves signal processing and digital signal analysis (cs.SD). The paper also discusses the use of mobile devices and the evaluation of the proposed technique in different locations, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY). The paper involves data collection and analysis, which falls under the category of multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the paper proposes a novel technique for copresence verification, which involves machine learning and pattern recognition (cs.SI).
